resources.string: Kana pane ari kuwongorora zvauri kuita pamasaisai, anowona kuti uri kushandisa OONI Probe.

Tarisa kana mawebsites akavhara achishandisa OONI's [Web Connectivity test](https://ooni.org/nettest/web-connectivity/).

Nguva dzese dzaucha dzvanya Shandisa, uchaongorora mawebsites akasiyana kubva ku Citizen Lab's [global](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/blob/master/lists/global.csv) ne [country-specific](https://github.com/citizenlab/test-lists/tree/master/lists)

Kuti uongorore masites aunoda, dzvanya sarudza mawebsites kana kuti sarudza chikamu chema sites nekuma settings. 

This test measures whether websites are blocked by means of DNS tampering, TCP/IP blocking or by a transparent HTTP proxy.

Your results will be published on [OONI Explorer](https://explorer.ooni.org/world/) and [OONI API](https://api.ooni.io/).
